pullRequest.title: Use a double for damage related keys.
pullRequest.bodyText:
API | Common
Using an int is an impl detail, damage is represented as doubles.

nodes.bodyText: Is it treated differently compared to how the implementation uses this integer? I figure the implementation stores this value to nbt, so would we be modifying the implementation to store a double instead?

commit.message:
Use a double for damage related keys.

Using an int is an impl detail, damage is represented as doubles.

beforeCommit.message:
Use a double for max falling block damage.

Using an int is an impl detail, damage is represented as doubles.

afterCommit.message:
Use a double for damage related keys.

Using an int is an impl detail, damage is represented as doubles.
